config.name: jce
config.description: JCE configuration for Java keystores and inline keys.

parameter.name: keystore
parameter.description: Path to the keystore file.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Type of the keystore.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Password for unlocking the keystore.

parameter.name: jceKeyInfos
parameter.description: List of keys to be considered, with internal IDs for referencing them.

parameter.name: useRandomIVs
parameter.description: Use random initial vectors (IVs) for CBC algorithms. In case of decryption, it assumes IV is prepended on the ciphertext.

parameter.name: expirationPolicy
parameter.description: Configures the minimum amount of time that a dynamic configuration instance can remain idle before the runtime considers it eligible for expiration. This does not mean that the platform will expire the instance at the exact moment that it becomes eligible. The runtime will actually purge the instances when it sees it fit.

config.name: pgp
config.description: Keystore configuration for GPG. Contains a list of keys with internal names to be used in the operations.

parameter.name: publicKeyring
parameter.description: Public key ring file.

parameter.name: privateKeyring
parameter.description: Private key ring file.

parameter.name: pgpKeyInfos
parameter.description: List of keys to be considered, with internal IDs for referencing them.

parameter.name: expirationPolicy
parameter.description: Configures the minimum amount of time that a dynamic configuration instance can remain idle before the runtime considers it eligible for expiration. This does not mean that the platform will expire the instance at the exact moment that it becomes eligible. The runtime will actually purge the instances when it sees it fit.

operation.name: jceDecrypt
operation.description: Decrypt a stream using JCE, with a key.

parameter.name: content
parameter.description: the content to decrypt

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: cipher
parameter.description: A raw cipher string in the form "algorithm/mode/padding", according to the Java crypto documentation. Note that not all combinations are valid.

parameter.name: algorithm
parameter.description: Algorithm from a list of valid definitions, this is preferred.

parameter.name: keyId
parameter.description: The key ID, as defined in the JCE configuration.

parameter.name: jceKeyInfo
parameter.description: An inline key definition.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable
